item.title: How can i upload a file to uppit
item.dc:creator: @pkatedge88 pkatedge88
item.description:
@pkatedge88 wrote:

make a winrar if u dont know how then right click ur desktop go to new then go to WINRAR Archive then name it w.e u want then drag the folder on to it w8 till it compress on it then go to uppit and click browse then find what u named folder then the link will apeare

You can upload .rar files to uppit and other file hosting sites
